mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_customer (name, tel, weixin, address, email, userid, companyid, companyname, level, type) VALUES (#{name},#{tel},#{weixin}, #{address},#{email},#{userid},#{companyid},#{companyname},#{level},#{type})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_customer WHERE companyid = #{companyid} and userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: SELECT id,name, tel, weixin, address, email, createtime, userid, companyid, companyname, level, type FROM t_customer WHERE id = #{id}
